name: opensign
description: OpenSign is a self-hosted electronic document signing platform. It supports secure signature workflows, audit trails, and multi-user collaboration with a web-based UI, offering privacy-focused document signing.
features: Electronic Signatures: Create legally binding digital signatures with certificate validation and timestamp verification.
Document Workflows: Design multi-step approval processes with automated routing and notification systems.
Template Management: Build reusable document templates with predefined signature fields and form elements.
Multi-party Signing: Enable sequential or parallel signing workflows for contracts requiring multiple signatures.
Audit Trails: Maintain comprehensive logs of all document actions, signatures, and modifications for compliance.
Privacy Focused: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over sensitive documents and signature data.
Mobile Friendly: Sign and review documents on any device with responsive design and touch-optimized interfaces.
API Integration: Connect with external systems through REST APIs for automated document generation and processing.
Custom Branding: Apply organization logos, colors, and styling to maintain professional appearance.
Secure Storage: Encrypt documents at rest and in transit with role-based access controls and retention policies.
Bulk Operations: Process multiple documents simultaneously with batch signing and automated workflows.
Real-time Collaboration: Enable simultaneous review and editing with live updates and comment systems.
